members.name: Normalize
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Normalize the output image by the sum of the kernel components

members.name: KernelZeroMagnitudeThreshold
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set the threshold value used to determine whether a frequency of the Fourier transform of the blurring kernel is considered to be zero. Default value is 1.0e-4.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Get the threshold value used to determine whether a frequency of the Fourier transform of the blurring kernel is considered to be zero. Default value is 1.0e-4.

tests.description: Inverse deconvolution of image blurred with a Gaussian kernel
